p: In addition to the secondary metabolites present in natural products with antioxidant action already mentioned for the treatment of ALS, it is also common the presence of other metabolites in extracts or fractions of extracts present in leaves, fruits, and roots, as well as in other natural products such as fungi and algae [ 78â€“ 80]. From here, we will present the presence and antioxidant mechanisms of tannins, terpenoids, lignans, quinones, saponins, methylxanthines, glucosinolates, and fatty acids directed to the treatment of ALS.
